publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3393 Alex Neil: Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff-That the Parliament recognises the valuable and courageous work undertaken by the fire service and calls for the introduction of a new pay formula together with a commensurate level of pay for firefighters and emergency fire control staff to ensure that these accurately reflect the highly skilled and professional role which they undertake.

S1M-3393*#* Alex Neil: Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff-That the Parliament recognises the valuable and courageous work undertaken by the fire service and *believes that a new pay formula together with a commensurate level of pay for firefighters and emergency fire control staff should be introduced* to ensure that these accurately reflect the highly skilled and professional role which they undertake.
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Tricia Marwick*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Michael Russell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr John McAllion*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3393# Alex Neil: Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff-That the Parliament recognises the valuable and courageous work undertaken by the fire service and believes that a new pay formula together with a commensurate level of pay for firefighters and emergency fire control staff should be introduced to ensure that these accurately reflect the highly skilled and professional role which they undertake. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Ms Margo MacDonald, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Michael Russell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Fergus Ewing, Mr John McAllion, Tommy Sheridan, Elaine Smith*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Irene McGugan*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Christine Grahame*, Brian Adam*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Scott Barrie*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Roseanna Cunningham*, Cathy Peattie*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Andrew Wilson*, Bill Butler*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Margaret Smith*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Susan Deacon*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Ian Jenkins*

S1M-3393# Alex Neil: Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff-That the Parliament recognises the valuable and courageous work undertaken by the fire service and believes that a new pay formula together with a commensurate level of pay for firefighters and emergency fire control staff should be introduced to ensure that these accurately reflect the highly skilled and professional role which they undertake. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Ms Margo MacDonald, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Michael Russell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Fergus Ewing, Mr John McAllion, Tommy Sheridan, Elaine Smith, Fiona McLeod, Irene McGugan, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Brian Adam, Scott Barrie, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona Hyslop, Roseanna Cunningham, Cathy Peattie, Linda Fabiani, Andrew Wilson, Bill Butler, Margaret Smith, Susan Deacon, Robin Harper, Ian Jenkins

S1M-3393# Firefighters and Emergency Fire Control Staff (lodged on 16 September 2002) Pauline McNeill*, Dennis Canavan*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Stewart Stevenson*, Richard Lochhead*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Nicola Sturgeon*
